text: Saint-Vincent-les-Forts is a former commune. It is in Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur in the Alpes-de-Haute-Provence department in southeast France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune of Ubaye-Serre-Ponçon.Arrêté préfectoral 16 December 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in Alpes-de-Haute-Provence
title: Saint-Vincent-les-Forts
